price: Na fa m’agya bͻne kyε no, nokorε sε ͻka ayerafoͻ no ho.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
